title: spack suddenly unable to build xSDK on NERSC edison
body:
@tgamblin @BarrySmith 

I am trying to install xSDK on edison using the amklinv/xsdk-tpetra-fix branch.  The installation goes fine until it gets to PETSc, at which point it produces the error message 

```

erface.c.o): relocation R_X86_64_32 against `.rodata.str1.1' can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC
/global/u1/a/amklinv/edison/spack/opt/spack/cray-CNL-ivybridge/gcc-6.1.0/trilinos-xsdk-0.2.0-kyct3xwwu6gnmehtbshvsgledvdnunko/lib/libchaco.a: could not read
symbols: Bad value
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
gmake[2]: *** [/tmp/amklinv/spack-stage/spack-stage-WPM2JX/petsc/arch-linux2-c-opt/lib/libpetsc.so.3.07.5] Error 1

  Send it and arch-linux2-c-opt/lib/petsc/conf/configure.log to petsc-maint@mcs.anl.gov
```
